General.Name: Sansuy S.A
General.Description: Sansuy S.A. engages in the manufacture and sale of flexible PVC plastics in Brazil. The company offers its products to agribusiness, aqua business, construction, architecture and decoration, transportation and logistics, coverings, visual communication, and industrialization. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Embu das Artes, Brazil.
General.Address: Rodovia REgis Bittencourt, Km 280, Embu Das Artes, SP, Brazil, 06830-900
